publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1355.2 Tommy Sheridan: Housing Stock Transfer-As an amendment to motion (S1M-1355) in the name of Fiona Hyslop, insert at end "and calls for the Executive to issue a new capital consent letter to each local authority advising them that they are now able to reinvest 100% of capital receipts in remaining stock, thus releasing millions of pounds more for investment in council homes throughout Scotland this financial year."
